content.question: Which of the diagrams above best represents the <math alttext="C H 2 O" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CH</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mtext>O</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> molecule, and why?

choices.label: Diagram 1, because all bond angles are <math alttext="180 degrees" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>180</mn><mi>Â°</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
Diagram 1, because all atoms have a formal charge of 0.
Diagram 2, because the molecule has a trigonal pyramidal shape.
Diagram 2, because all atoms have a formal charge of 0.

content.answer: Diagram 2, because all atoms have a formal charge of 0.

skill.text: 6.C: Support a claim with evidence from representations or models at the particulate level, such as the structure of atoms and/or molecules.
